product_desc:
UPROSPECT Social Selling Platform - UPROSPECT's vision is to help all SMBs in the world generate 300%-500% more prospects, opportunities and revenue for their business. 

Business Challenges
Over 99% of businesses in the world are 10 employees and under and more businesses fail then start every month. Typically SMBs are challenged due to a lack of sales and marketing execution. Most SMBs don't have the expertise, resources, time or money to effectively utilize industry leading sales / marketing software, work with expensive digital marketing agencies or sales coaches. 

UPROSPECT has solved these challenges by building a centralized, easy to use,  cloud based, social selling platform.

To schedule a demo or discuss investment opportunities please reach out to Michael Bertoni, Founder & CTO - PhillyTech at mbertoni@phillytech dot CO or 1.844.PHILLYTECH.
high_concept: #1 Resource for Tech, Digital and Social Selling
name: PhillyTech
